version_description: You have been chosen to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry!
You have been chosen to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry!

Magic Spells, Potions & More
- Attend classes to learn and master magical skills like casting spells and brewing potions.
- Unlock new characters, spells, potions and locations as you advance through the years of Hogwarts.
- Customize your student avatar.
Mystery and Adventure
- Use your magical skills to investigate mysteries at Hogwarts.
- Discover the truth behind the Cursed Vaults and your brother's disappearance in an all new story.
Friendships that Matter
- Bond with your housemates to win the House Cup.
- Go on quests to help friends and fellow students…or frustrate rivals.
- Earn respect and build relationships by adventuring together.

Magic Spells, Potions & More
- Attend classes to learn and master magical skills like casting spells and brewing potions.
- Unlock new characters, spells, potions and locations as you advance through the years of Hogwarts.
- Customize your student avatar.
Mystery and Adventure
- Use your magical skills to investigate mysteries at Hogwarts.
- Discover the truth behind the Cursed Vaults and your brother's disappearance in an all new story.
Friendships that Matter
- Bond with your housemates to win the House Cup.
- Go on quests to help friends and fellow students…or frustrate rivals.
- Earn respect and build relationships by adventuring together.

- Go on quests to help friends and fellow students…or frustrate rivals.
- Earn respect and build relationships by adventuring together.

- Tonks, Mandrakes, and Butterbeer make their debut in the latest story update!
- Level up your friendships between adventures! Complete special interactions with your companions to discover unique story moments. No energy required!
- Show your house pride! For a limited time, collect stars in classes to earn special rewards!

- Tonks, Mandrakes, and Butterbeer make their debut in the latest story update!
- Level up your friendships between adventures! Complete special interactions with your companions to discover unique story moments. No energy required!
- Show your house pride! For a limited time, collect stars in classes to earn special rewards!

- Fixes an issue logging into Facebook

- Pets Now Available! Visit your Dormitory to adopt a new Pet to take through Hogwarts with you. Sleeping Pets give you Energy!
- Learn all about Nifflers, Bowtruckles, and Hippogriffs in Care of Magical Creatures in new Year 4 stories. Discover Centaurs and giant spiders in the Forbidden Forest as you uncover new mysteries at Hogwarts.
- Earn attribute bonuses when you purchase new clothes!
- Coming Soon: For a limited-time, challenge other players in the Duelling Club to win cool rewards!

- 到你的宿舍看看，领养一只新的宠物，让它跟着你玩转整个霍格沃茨。睡觉的宠物可以为你添加能量！
- 在第 4 学年的故事中，通过保护神奇生物课了解关于嗅嗅、护树罗锅和鹰马兽的知识。揭开霍格沃茨新的秘密，在禁林中探索和发现马人和巨型蜘蛛。
- 购买新的服装可赢取属性奖励！
- 即将推出限时活动：在决斗俱乐部挑战其他玩家，赢取酷炫奖励！

- 到你的宿舍看看，领养一只新的宠物，让它跟着你玩转整个霍格沃茨。睡觉的宠物可以为你添加能量！
- 在第 4 学年的故事中，通过保护神奇生物课了解关于嗅嗅、护树罗锅和鹰马兽的知识。揭开霍格沃茨新的秘密，在禁林中探索和发现马人和巨型蜘蛛。
- 购买新的服装可赢取属性奖励！
- 即将推出限时活动：在决斗俱乐部挑战其他玩家，赢取酷炫奖励！

- Fixed an issue with purchasing items from the Store

- Hagrid needs your help looking after Magical Creatures! Visit the Magical Creatures Reserve to adopt Nifflers, Bowtruckles, Fairies, and more! Build trust with Magical Creatures to earn rewards and master Magizoology!

- Your Magical Creatures are still hungry! Earn rewards for continuing to feed your creatures once they've reached max level.
- New creatures spotted in the Magical Creatures Reserve!

- It’s Christmas at Hogwarts! Check for a broomstick in your stocking and see magic on display! Grab a warm butterbeer and cozy up to the fire in the Great Hall or bewitch snowballs for a friendly snowball fight!
- Performance improvements and bug fixes

- It's Hallowe'en at Hogwarts! All month long we're celebrating the Dark Arts with spooky limited-time events and new Pets!
- Show off your Dormitory Looks with the new Snapshot Mode! Customize your Dorm with Pet and Dorm Looks -- more options are coming soon!
- More incentivized video offers have been added

MAJOR UPDATE!
Calling all Quidditch fans! Quidditch Season has begun at Hogwarts!
- Players who have completed Year 2, Chapter 6 can now tryout for their House Quidditch Team to begin their journey to Quidditch Cup victory!
- Meet new Quidditch teammates and friends Skye, Orion, and Murphy
- Unlock new Quidditch gameplay mode and customization options
- Learn new Quidditch moves and strategies
- Explore multiple all new Quidditch environments
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

- Fixes various errors related to Events
- Performance improvements
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

- Discover a Plimpy and a Grindylow in the new Lake area of Magical Creatures Reserve!
- Need to brush up on your Duelling skills? Challenge opponents in the Duelling Room whenever you want to practice! Duelling Club is now available between events.

- Fixed an issue where players couldn’t change their skin tone or lip color
- Fixed a long-standing issue where scenes would break when reloading
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

- Love is in the air at Hogwarts! Hogwarts is abuzz about the arrival of famous young alum Gilderoy Lockhart who is hosting a special Valentine's Day event.
- Don't miss out on your opportunity to take your crush out on a romantic date!
- Show off your favorite Valentine's Day looks!
- Try your hand at being a Beater in Season 2 of Quidditch!
